body.p: The core of oXygen XML Author can be deployed on a server, allowing a variety of HTML5-enabled client devices to edit and review XML content. Despite the efforts spent to ensure that the frameworks, options, and plugins behave similarly in both WebApp and standalone version of oXygen XML Author, there might be some differences imposed by specific platform limitations.
